DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: sizes_Burkhardtetal
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This data file contains the measurements of flower size taken on female plants of Silene latifolia. These plants were arising from selection lines and grown in the greenhouse. The file was created using Excel 2011. Detailed information on the data is provided in the ReadMe file.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: parasitism
phenotypic selection
Pollination
mutualism
sexual dimorphism
